name: hapi-version
description: Hapi route versioning using custom header

scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Corintho Assunção <corintho.filho@gmail.com>
